Text.Page:
Trouble, trouble, trouble. Need help from {@LinkCreature:218#1027#Takucha}, but cannot go.

You go, say I sent you. Otherwise no talking, no help.

Hmm. Kunchara? Trusted friend. I help.

Tribe became angry. Something about a spell. No turning back now.

Must eliminate leader, {@LinkCreature:18#101#Tukarus}. Go go go.

That is Tukarus. Remember him well.

Always did have big head. Ha!

Take back to Kunchara, yes?
Get lost? {@LinkCreature:18#101#Tukarus} is back that way.

Tukarus's head? You, um?

He knew the truth, but didn't think Takucha would have you, er...."Are you feeling okay?"

Oh. Yes! Kunchara good.

Thank you for...uh, this.
